title: Valve is dropping local currency support for Turkey and Argentina amid 'exchange rate volatility,' moving to 'regionalized USD pricing' for 25 countries
description: Some countries will see Steam prices go up—in others, they may go down.

title: Starbreeze explains ongoing Payday 3 patch delay: 'There was a significant risk to player progression being wiped' by update errors
description: Payday 3's first patch is now in the console certification process.

title: The Five Nights at Freddy's movie is being mauled by critics as 'not scary,' 'bloodless,' and 'puzzling'
description: After nearly a decade in the making, early reviews for Five Nights at Freddy's say it's more "yawns" than scares.

title: Still Wakes the Deep's debut gameplay trailer asks, 'What if Dear Esther was set on an oil rig, and also something was trying to eat you?'
description: The Chinese Room gave us our first look at its upcoming horror game during today's Xbox showcase.

title: Like a Dragon: Infinite Wealth goes full Animal Crossing, will let you manage an island paradise 'with a cozy DIY lifestyle'
description: Even Yakuza need a breather.

title: 6 years after Ark: Survival Evolved left early access, Ark: Survival Evolved's remaster enters early access
description: The Unreal Engine 5 version of the dino-survival game arrives on Steam today, called Ark: Survival Ascended.

title: 14 console games that should've been on PC instead
description: When is a PC game not a PC game? When it’s one of these misplaced gems.

title: 2023's most slept-on horror game is getting an absolutely sadistic new mode where nearly everything's randomized and you have to spend precious fuel just to save
description: Just in time for Halloween.

title: Steam's most wishlisted city builder, Manor Lords, announces 2024 early access launch date
description: The historically accurate city builder with tactical battles was originally planed to release sometime this year.

title: I ranked all 16 of Return to Moria's beard options from worst to best
description: Which beard is the prettiest beard of them all?

title: Starfield's inevitable community patch has arrived on the scene
description: The latest in a long line of community patches for Bethesda's endlessly moddable games.

title: Cities: Skylines 2 studio promises performance issues can and will be fixed: 'We want to assure you that the issues are not deeply rooted in the game’s foundation'
description: Colossal Order chose to release the game in its current state because it would have been "unfair" to eager fans to delay it.

title: Skyrim's former design lead tips his hat to Baldur's Gate 3: 'Very few of the decisions in a Bethesda game feel highly meaningful, you get maybe three or four'
description: D&D, storytelling, and the pain of mixing the two in video games.

title: If RDNA 5 can't turn things around I have a tough time believing AMD will stick around in PC graphics for much longer
description: Could AMD give up on discrete gaming GPUs and stick to consoles and APUs?

title: Total War: Pharaoh lets you seek favour from three pantheons of gods in an ancient world on the brink of collapse
description: Egypt is on the edge in Creative Assembly's latest grand strategy. Can the gods help?

title: Skyrim's retired lead designer says anything other than the 'Bethesda usual' has to be approved by Todd Howard: 'He doesn't believe it's true, but unfortunately it's true'
description: At Bethesda, the buck stops with Todd.

title: I made a one-way bathtub Geralt city in Cities: Skylines 2 and want to move there
description: Welcome to my crowdsourced city.

title: Skull Island: Rise of Kong review
description: It’s a gibbon that this is the least ape-pealing game of 2023.

title: Your current cooler may be ready for Intel's next-gen CPUs if this manual is to be believed
description: AZZA's new cooler manuals suggest that cross-compatibility between LGA 1700 and LGA 1851 cooling solutions is a thing.

title: How to get Bronze Ingots in Return to Moria
description: You'll need two types of metal to smelt this crafting material.

title: This graphics mod for Dark Souls is so comprehensive it breaks a boss fight, letting you bomb the Capra Demon from on-high
description: Considering he brings dogs to a sword fight, it's only fair.

title: Qualcomm wants to convert your PC from x86 to Arm with its killer new 12-core chip
description: Qualcomm's ex-Apple engineers have cooked up something faster and more efficient than just about anything, according to the claims.

description: Summon the King of Maggots for a chance to get an Uber Unique.

title: There is a way to lower Core i9 14900K temps but it involves performing the PC equivalent of open-heart surgery
description: Big risks sometimes reap big rewards, but do you really want to give your new CPU a sunroof?

title: Excel no longer messes things up for scientists trying to store genetic codes in a spreadsheet
description: But it really shouldn't have taken Microsoft this long to provide a solution.

title: Dataminers find evidence Konami will free Metal Gear Solid 4 from PS3 purgatory, but it's hard to be excited about it
description: The ports of MGS 2 and 3 don't fill me with hope for the future.

title: Ex-Bethesda dev says Starfield could've focused on 'two dozen solar systems', but 'people love our big games … so let's go ahead and let 'em have it'
description: "Todd pretty much pulled the number 100 for the number of star systems out of thin air."

title: Wordle today: Hint and answer #858 for Wednesday, October 25

title: It took a modder just hours to add 4K support to the Metal Gear Solid collection
description: MGS1 and MGS2 are locked at 720p on PC, but getting them to run at higher resolutions has turned out to be trivial with a mod.
